tool.name: fpfilter

param.name: vcf
param.label: VCF File
param.help: The input VCF file. Must have a GT field.

param.name: bam
param.label: bam file
param.help: The BAM file of the sample you are filtering on. Typically the tumor.

param.name: sample
param.label: Sample
param.help: The sample name of the sample you want to filter on in the VCF file.

param.name: reference
param.label: Reference Genome
param.help: A fasta containing the reference sequence the BAM file was aligned to

param.name: min_read_pos
param.label: Min Read Pos
param.help: Minimum average relative distance from start/end of read.

param.name: min_strandness
param.label: Min Strandness
param.help: Minimum representation of variant allele on each strand.

param.name: max_mm_qualsum_diff
param.label: Max mm qualsum diff
param.help: Maximum difference of mismatch quality sum between variant and reference reads (paralog filter).

param.name: max_var_mm_qualsum
param.label: Max var mm qualsum
param.help: Maximum mismatch quality sum of reference-supporting reads.

param.name: max_mapqual_diff
param.label: Max mapqual diff
param.help: Maximum difference of mapping quality between variant and reference reads.

param.name: max_readlen_diff
param.label: Max readlen diff
param.help: Maximum difference of average supporting read length between variant and reference reads (paralog filter)

param.name: min_var_dist_3
param.label: Min var dist 3
param.help: minimum average distance to effective 3prime end of read (real end or Q2) for variant-supporting reads

tool.help: --vcf-file the input VCF file. Must have a GT field. --bam-file the BAM file of the sample you are filtering on. Typically the tumor. --sample the sample name of the sample you want to filter on in the VCF file. --reference-sequence a fasta containing the reference sequence the BAM file was aligned to. --output the filename of the output VCF file --min-read-pos minimum average relative distance from start/end of read --min-var-freq minimum variant allele frequency --min-var-count minimum number of variant-supporting reads --min-strandedness minimum representation of variant allele on each strand --max-mm-qualsum-diff maximum difference of mismatch quality sum between variant and reference reads (paralog filter) --max_var_mm_qualsum maximum mismatch quality sum of reference-supporting reads --max-mapqual-diff maximum difference of mapping quality between variant and reference reads --max-readlen-diff maximum difference of average supporting read length between variant and reference reads (paralog filter) --min-var-dist-3 minimum average distance to effective 3prime end of read (real end or Q2) for variant-supporting reads
